siteMetadata.title: 国外股市热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览国外股票社区里的热门讨论

blogPost.title:
This scenario is now a higher probability than it's been in years:

higher GDP growth (from increased govt spending)

higher inflation

higher rates

tech stocks finally underperform

small caps & value stocks outperform

who says no?
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
这种情况现在的可能性比过去几年都要高：

更高的GDP增长(来自增加的政府支出)

更高的通货膨胀率

更高的费率

Tech股票最终表现不佳

小盘股&A；VALUE股票跑赢大盘

谁说不呢？

這種情況現在的可能性比過去幾年都要高：

更高的GDP增長(來自增加的政府支出)

更高的通貨膨脹率

更高的費率

Tech股票最終表現不佳

小盤股&A；VALUE股票跑贏大盤

誰說不呢？

previous.excerpt:
I keep hearing a few friends who recently started investing (no more than a year
or two) and they keep saying they want to be able to quit their job and survive
on stocks. They spend countless hours reading news headlines and looking at
mostly irrelevant graphs for trends to try and time things.…

localize.title: 朋友们不断提到交易是一种“职业”。
